unnormalised: Boro, konnem tori lognachi yojana korpache vixim ani soglle tarikho ugddas dovortole vixim vicharlem, barobar? Mhaka sangta, tem ekdom jinjatachem kam! Mazi bain, Priyan pattlea vorsak logn kelem, ani soglo gharaantlo lok doke nastole kombde bhaxen dhaumtaalo. Poilem, 12/05/2023 haka nischitarthaacho karyakram aslo. Magir, haldi utsov 02/08/2024 sokallim 10:00 vazta tharailolo. Sach sangta, hanv soglleank chai kortalo, punn mhaka tenntanui tras zatalo!
normalised: Bore, konnain tor lagnachi planning korche vixim ani soglle tarikho ugddas dovorche vixim vicharlem, barem? Mhaka sangta, tem ek proper juggle! Moji cousin, Priya, pichle vorosa lagin zali, ani sogllem famil xir viretan kombdeam baxe bhonvtalle. Poilem, bara May don hojar ani teis vorosan engagement aslem. Magir, Haldi ceremony don August don hojar ani chovis vorsak sokalli dha vorak theravlelem. Sach sangta, hanv soglleam khatir chai kortali, pun hanv tenuy stress aslem!

unnormalised: Uprant asloli asloli lognachi tarik: 03/08/2024. Ami sokallim 4:00 vazta pasun toiaari korunk survat keli! Pandit ji haka sogllea vostunk nirdishtt vel zai aslo, 11:15 vaztanch pheram zai asle. Vel tharavun vosthi book korpa khatir (mhine poilim!) ani soglle vepaareank eksarkhe korpa modlem, mhaka sogllo lekho dovornna khatir fakt ek spreadsheet lagtaalem. Ami ek logna poilim foto sessionsui tharailem, 2 sattve poilim, 20/07/2024 haka.
normalised: Magir asloli lagnachi tarik aileli: teen August don hojar ani chovis voros. Ami sokalli char vorar poripas kortak suru kelem! Pandit ji haka soglle vostun khatir nirdisht timinga zai aslem, barem fere ekdom gyara pandra vorar sokalli. Venue book korche khatir tarikho ugddas dovorche (mahinem adim!) ani soglle vendorancho samanjas korcho, mhaka ek spreadsheet zai aslem he sogllem track kortak. Amche lagim don haftem adim ek pre-wedding shoot theravlelem, visa July don hojar ani chovis vorar.

unnormalised: Sach sangta, hanv dink shaktai asloli utam utam sal'la mhunllear kam vanttun divop! Priyache soirennin vhodd divsa poilim zata soglle karyakramacho lekho dovorlo. Tiche xivai ami nimanne tarikhecho nivedon dhaddpacho chuktalem, jo 15/06/2024 haka korpak zai aslo. Mhunn, tuka konn tori visvashacho mellovun taka tarikho, vel ani nimannne tarikhecho vevostha korpaak sang – tem tuka puro traas thoddo kortolem!
normalised: Sach sangta, hanv tumkam ditolem uttam suchovneman je delegation. Priya che dostan vhodd divasank yetolem soglle eventancho track dovorchechi jababdari ghetli. Tiche vina, ami bodlek invite pathounk theravlelea tarikhancho miss keletele, ji pandra June don hojar ani chovis vorosan korcheak aslem. Bare, konnak tori sodun kad ji tumche visarachi asa tumka tarikho, timinga ani deadline sambalpak madad kortak – ten tunche khup dokdukhi vachovtel!
